means: (pl. Wolof,Wolofs)沃洛夫人（塞内加尔和冈比亚人）

sentence.Network_cn: 一些非洲人讲尼日尔-刚果语.

sentence.Network_en: Language: The official language is French. Wolof , Pulaar, Diola and Mandingo are also used.
sentence.Network_cn: 语言: 法语为官方语言. 沃洛夫语 、 皮拉尔语、迪乌拉语和曼丁哥语也通用.

sentence.Network_en: Language: Arabic is the official languages. Arabic , Poular, Soninke and Wolof are the national languages.
sentence.Network_cn: 语言: 阿拉伯语为官方语言. 阿拉伯语、颇拉语 、 索宁克语和乌洛夫语为民族语言.

means.word_mean: 1. the West AFrican language of the Wolof people in Senegal; related to Fula

auth_sentence.content: He said the men were speaking both Wolof and Dioula, regional Senegalese languages.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said the men were speaking both Wolof and Dioula, regional Senegalese languages.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said the men were speaking both Wolof and Dioula, regional Senegalese languages.

auth_sentence.content: It is served between lunch and dinner, a meal known in the Wolof language as Ndiagonal.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is served between lunch and dinner, a meal known in the Wolof language as Ndiagonal.

auth_sentence.content: In a corner, four young women sit around a board game called "safe motherhood" in the local Wolof language.
